#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define MOD 1000000007

ll fact[2100000];

ll pw(ll a, ll b)
{
	if(b==0)
		return 1;
	ll temp = pw(a,b/2);
	temp = (temp*temp)%MOD;
	if(b%2 == 0)
		return temp;
	else
		return (temp*a)%MOD;
}

ll inv_mod(ll a)
{
	return pw(a,MOD-2);
}

ll NCR(ll n, ll r)
{
	ll ans = fact[n];
	ans = (ans*inv_mod(fact[r]))%MOD;
	ans = (ans*inv_mod(fact[n-r]))%MOD;
	return ans;
}

int main()
{
	fact[0] = 1;
	for(int i = 1 ; i < 2100000; i++)
		fact[i] = (fact[i-1]*i)%MOD;
	int t;
	long n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%ld",&n);
		if(n<13)
		printf("0\n");
		else
		{
			n=n-13;
			ll ans=0;
			while(n>=0)
			{
				ans=(ans%MOD+NCR((n/2)+5,5)%MOD)%MOD;
				n=n-2;
			}
			printf("%lld\n",ans);
		}
	}
}
